name: @ArnabXD/TGVCBot
description: Telegram Bot to Play Music in Voice Chat

LOG_CHANNEL.description: LOG Channel ID (Make sure bot and VC User are added in the group)

SESSION.description: GramJS/Telethon Session of the VC User. https://ssg.rojser.best

THUMBNAIL.description: Direct link for default thumbnail (used if audio has no thumbnails).

MAX_DURATION.description: Maximum Duration support for Streams (in seconds). Default 36000

WATERMARK.description: Text to render on bottom left corner of Banner. Default: `TGVCBot`. (10-14 chars)
